column5: My apartment is in a newly built building completely furnished with granite counter tops, a garden tub, and a full size washer and dryer.   This location is PERFECT for anyone visiting Houston. It is located right next to the metro rail, which can get you to NRG Stadium, George R. Brown Convention Center, Toyota Center, Discovery Green, Eastdowntown, Minute Maid park, Dynamo Stadium, Rice Village, Memorial Herman Park, Museum District, Medical Center, and the University of Houston.
column8: Beautiful Luxury Apartment in Central Location!
